it.polimi.se2018.model

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    the class GameBoard represents the game board for a game that contains all the information of the game. Any variation must go through this class to be sure of the reliability of the game data
    Author:
    Luca Genoni

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer(int indexPlayerEnded)
                throws GameIsBlockedException,
                       CurrentPlayerException,
                       GameIsOverException,
                       FatalGameErrorException,
                       ValueDiceWrongException
        change the current player to the next and end the game. check the state of the player for the first/second turn move the dice in hand to the DicePool.
        Parameters:
        indexPlayerEnded - that request the move
        Throws:
        GameIsBlockedException - if the game can't be modified
        CurrentPlayerException - if the requester isn't the current player
        GameIsOverException - if the game is over
        FatalGameErrorException - if the game is corrupted
        ValueDiceWrongException

      • addNewDiceToHandFromDicePool

        public void addNewDiceToHandFromDicePool(int indexPlayer,
                                         int indexDicePool)
                                  throws NoDiceException,
                                         GameIsBlockedException,
                                         CurrentPlayerException,
                                         AlreadyDrawANewDiceException
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - index of the player that request the move
        indexDicePool - index of the dice chosen
        Throws:
        NoDiceException - there is no dice in the selected position
        GameIsBlockedException
        CurrentPlayerException
        AlreadyDrawANewDiceException

      • increaseOrDecrease

        public void increaseOrDecrease(int indexPlayer,
                               boolean increase)
                        throws GameIsBlockedException,
                               CurrentPlayerException,
                               ValueDiceWrongException,
                               NoDiceInHandException,
                               NoDiceException
        Parameters:
        indexPlayer - integer that indicate which player send the request of
        increase - true of increase the value false for decrease
        Throws:
        GameIsBlockedException - if the game can't be access
        CurrentPlayerException - if it isn't the player's turn
        ValueDiceWrongException - if the request doesn't respect the dice domain
        NoDiceInHandException - if the player have no dice in hand
        NoDiceException
